backend/main.mo: Defines all backend data types and maps for clients, workouts, logs, trainers, and bookings, with initial access control and authentication helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI color‑theme work to specific files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files and components for reference or documentation.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Markdown guide explaining how to configure custom domains for the Internet Computer app, including DNS and domain declaration steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH stylesheet defining light and dark CSS variables and applying base theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enforcing light mode via meta and script, loading the React app root.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists approved custom domains for the deployed Internet Computer frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, view routing, session persistence, and enforced light‑theme behavior.
frontend/src/components/admin/PersonnelT: Admin table component displaying registered trainer identities with fallback UI when empty.
frontend/src/components/client/Appointme: Appointment request form that validates inputs, submits a mutation, and displays confirmed appointments and status messages.
frontend/src/components/client/AssignedW: Fetches and displays assigned workouts, showing loading and empty states and allowing users to log workout completion.
frontend/src/components/client/Compilabl: Renders a workout card where clients input sets, reps, and weight, validates entries, and saves a workout log.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutLo: Displays sorted workout logs with completion status and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutRu: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
Interactive workout runner that guides users through exercises with timers, navigation, and exercise details.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component showing a styled fallback UI with reload option when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Bodyweig: Shows bodyweight trends over time with summary stats and a simple visual chart.
frontend/src/components/trainer/BookingU: Form dialog for creating or editing bookings with validation and time handling.
frontend/src/components/trainer/ClientWo: Displays a client’s workouts with exercise details and optional edit actions.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Exercise: Shows exercise performance history grouped by exercise with search filtering and progression comparison.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerB: Monthly bookings calendar allowing day selection and booking creation or editing via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerC: Tabbed client detail view handling height, weight, performance history, and workout management.
frontend/src/components/trainer/WorkoutB: Form component for creating or editing workouts, managing exercises, sets, weights, and rest times with mutation hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Reusable countdown timer hook providing start, pause, reset, and completion state for exercises.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for backend calls including admin, trainer, client auth, and workout-related operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom light color theme variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that verifies admin access and displays trainer and overview data with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders the admin login screen, handling authentication via a mutation and showing errors or loading states. Provides navigation back to the main login page.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Displays the client dashboard with progress logs, assigned workouts, workout runner, and forms to add workout progress. Manages workout editing, running, and server mutations for progress submission.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLoginPage.tsx: Provides client login with username and PT code, validating input and authenticating via backend actor. Handles error messages and navigation to registration or trainer login.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Implements the trainer dashboard showing PT code, clients list, client details, booking calendar, and settings for email, PT code, and identity. Supports multiple update mutations and related UI states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Trainer login page that authenticates using an access code via backend actor, with error handling and navigation to client or admin login.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Client registration page validating username and PT code, registering the user, auto-authenticating on success, and handling detailed error messages. Includes input for optional email or nickname.
frontend/src/utils/bookingTime.ts: Utility functions for building, formatting, and converting Date objects and backend nanosecond time values.
frontend/src/utils/trainerAuthErrors.ts: Parses various trainer auth errors and maps them to deterministic, user-friendly English messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and extracts/logs raw error details.
frontend/src/utils/workoutRestTimes.ts: Handles per-set rest times including normalization, validation, formatting, and bigint conversion.
frontend/src/utils/workoutSetWeights.ts: Manages per-set workout weights with normalization, validation, formatting, and bigint conversion.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, animations, and layout settings using custom CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, known issues, and feature requests for restoring the original color palette.
